text: UPDATED: MAR 13, 2017 Richtig gelungenes Wheat Ale. Das kÃ¶nnen sie, hat ja schon das American Wheat bewiesen. Leuchtend weizengetrÃ¼bt und mit GrÃ¼nstich im heugelb. Klasse, denn auch der Duft lÃ¤ÃŸt sich nicht lumpen. Floral, limettig, frischholzig und spicey. Rosmarie & grÃ¼ne Paprika. Pfeffer & Koriander. Nice. Der Trunk ist hellmalzig, kurz angesweetet und dann deutlich hopfendry. Fresh & wie ein Softball auf den Gaumen. ðŸ˜Ž. MHD01/17. Trotzdem noch supi. A Gift von den tollen Wein/Bierladen in Haarlem, NL.

Aroma:

Medium aroma of malts, wheat, tropical fruit and hops.

Appearance:

Turbid yellow beer with heavy yeast and with a slight/medium white head.

Taste/Palate:

Starts medium sweet with malts, wheat and tropical fruit; ends slightly bitter and dry with hops.

Overall:

This beer is rather intense, complex and balanced. The hops are definitely most dominant, pushing the wheat away. A really refreshing hoppy wheat ale.

33 cl bottle @ home. Cloudy, pale yellow color. Rocky and frothy white head.
AromaÂ’s: resinous, tropical fruit, light perfumey, wheat. Retronasal itÂ’s wheat, a bit sour, hops, fruit, resin. Flavor is light fruity sour with a decent bitterness. Light bodied. Carbonation is a bit high in the beginning. Finishes with wheat, then moderate bitter and somewhat dry. Light but flavorful, nice Summer beer indeed.

33cl flesje via Drankgigant 
Alcoholpercentage van 5,6%
Uitgeschonken in St. Bernardus glas

Uiterlijk: blond met redelijke schuimkraag

Aroma en smaak: bitter, citrus, grapefruit, kumquats kan ik inkomen dat erop staat, bloemig, hoppig

Conclusie: lekkere smaakcombinaties en bitter en fris 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

33 cl bottle at home. Appearance: yellow with low white head. Aroma: grapefruit, lemon, coriander, soapy and hops. Kind of IPA-ish, in a good way. Taste: medium sweetness with a decent bitterness. Bitter finish with notes of grapefruit and lemongrass. Palate: medium body, thin texture and lively carbonation.
0,33l fles uitgeschonken geel met een witte kraag. Geur zepig van de mosaic met een dikke citroen en wat ananas. Smaak goed bitter als bitterlemon best droog Nice

Draft 0.2l at Brouwerij Â’t IJ Amsterdam, The Netherlands. 17.05.2016. Pour it bright yellow color slighty hazy with medium white head. Aroma fresh grass, hoppy, some peppery note. Taste starts with slightly fruity note, citrus, continues with harsh grassy feel, finish sweet yeasty feel. After taste lemon, dry finish as well,better then Bret version definitely.

33cl bottle at home. Pours a clear golden colour with a nice soapy white head. Aroma of flowers, citrus, grapefruit, yeast, mint. Taste is light sweet, medium bitter with a dry bitter finish. Notes of malts, hops, grass, citrus, tropical fruit, resin. Texture is sticky, medium bodied with lively carbonation

Bottle at Gollem. Pours unclear yellow. Small white head. Smell is dry, mild wheat. Mildly bitter, nicely hopped. Well intense on yeast. Very gentle. Balanced, but not lackig intznsity. Great take on this style !!

(Â’t IJ Summer Wheat Ale) Bottle 330 ml at home, served into a shaker, ABV 5.6%
Bright yellow colour on the body with lots of actiivity in the glass, clear, with a tall and frothy, white head on top, with average retention.
Aroma has citrus, grapefruit, lots of floral notes, wheat, hops, tropical fruits.
Taste has plenty of grassy hops, nicely bitter, with citrus and grapefruit, tropical fruits, again some floral notes.
Medium thin body, high carbonation.
Refreshing and thirst-quenching. Very good and highly drinkable.
Fris licht zoetig met citrus schil bittertje, vleugje druif en een in balans zijnde nasmaak. Aroma veel van hetzelfde, limoen met wat suiker en munt. Prima bite.

33cl Bottle at The Black Smith. Hazy golden colour, white head. Aroma of grapefruit, lemon, lime, light sweaty hops, wheat, nice bright citrus. Flavour is light to medium sweet, wheat, grapefruit, lemon, lime, light dank-ness, bitter finish. Light bodied, a bit fizzy. Tasty.
bellÂ’aspetto giallo torbida con lievito sospeso, aroma di agrumi, fresca e dissetante con bel sapore floreale, coriandolo e agrumata e lievito.
Bottle, kumquats and soft herbal notes in the aroma. Wheaty sweetish, citric, spicy flavor, coreander, Anis. Mint finish. Slightly out of balance.

Bottle 33cl. Poured into a shaker. Hazy golden, small frothy white head, mostly diminishing; shy aroma, tangerine, lemon, slight malty, wheat; taste medium bitter and slightly sweet, earthy; dry bitter and mineral aftertaste; light body, watery texture, soft carbonation; nice, fresh.

Bottle at De Paas after Kaapse 2nd Anniversary. Hazy pale golden with thin white head. Very grassy, light citrus peels, herbal tea. Light sweet, mild bitter. Under medium body. Low carbonation but chalky feel.

Bottle at De Paas. Hazy light golden with lots of little things swimming around happily. Sweat, lime, green onion, lemon, grassy, soft dough, light peach, quite yeasty. Light sweet and bitter. Medium bodied with soft doughy feel. Quite nice except the sweat.

Bottle shared at De Paas. Hazy straw with a white head. Aroma of citrus, light earthy hops, mineral notes and light spicy hops. Flavour is light sweet and above moderate bitter. Light to light medium bodied with light carbonation.
Uit de fles geschonken. Lichtgeel bier, troebel en met vlokken. Heerlijk geurig bier, hoppig en citrus. Dit komt ook in de smaak terug, hop, citrus, lekker bitter. Een mooi zomerbier.

Licht geel, troebel witbier met veel drijvende deeltjes... Dat ziet er dus goed uit. Mooie volle witte schuimkraag die lang blijft. Aroma: Citrus, floraal iets grassig en boerderij. Ook een tropische fruit hint komt naar voren.
Smaak: Citrus/Grapefruit maar dan in een zoetere vorm, erg fris. Bitterzoet zou ik zeggen. Fruitige en een tik kruidigheid waardoor er toch ook scherp randje aan zit. In de afdronk een goede hop nabitter die fruitig en kruidig is. Redelijk volle body weinig koolzuur, makkellijk drinkbaar in het zonnetje. Ietwat droog en moeilijk in een hokje te plaatsen deze Hoppige witte. Lekker is deze zeker!
Bottle, pours hazy light yellow with a white head. Nice hoppy aroma, with orange, lemon, tropical fruit, wheat notes. Taste pretty much follows with a light spiciness. Nice, fruity and refreshing.
Bottle at home in garden, 15th May 16. Pours clear, aroma is hops, floral, some citrus. Taste is slight citrus, wheat, grain, brewery yeast. Good stuff.
Pale yellow with a small white head and medium carbonation. Refreshing with a light body. Up front citrussy then wheats and a resinous dry bitter finish. Very sessionable.

33cl bottle at home. Somewhat hazy golden with a medium white soapy head. Medium body with moderate carbonation. Nice bitter tones with some fruity sweetness. Wheat, citrus, tangerine, grapefruit and some spices. Refreshing subtle bitter brew.

sample from bottle, poured a slight hazy golden colour with a white head. nose is intense fruity, lotÂ’s of sweet tropical fruits, pineapple, lyche, mango, stone fruits, slight malty, wheat, crisp. taste is nowhere as near as the nose. crisp mouthfeel, minerals, wheat. nevertheless. a very nice and clean beer

0.33 l bottle from Â’De BierkoningÂ’, best before January 2017. Minimally hazy, pale golden yellow with a thin, frothy, slowly diminishing, white head. Fruity-grassy, slightly floral and a little herbal aroma of lime, pineapple, lychee, lemongrass and grapefruit. Slightly bitter, fruity-grassy, slightly floral taste of wheat, straw and some citrus, followed by a medium long, moderately dry-bitter and quite grassy finish. Thin to medium body, slightly effervescent mouthfeel, average carbonation. Quite nice, but the aroma is way better than the taste. Nevertheless very pleasant in the heat.

30cl draught at the brewery on 05-May-2016. Hazy pale colour with a medium sized white head. Tropical fruits and sweet malt on the nose. Light to medium body and carbonation. Citrus, pineapple, sweet fruits and hops on tasting. Nice bittersweet finish. Refreshing for a sunny Amsterdam public holiday afternoon!
Light golden colour, pretty opaque. Thin white head. Immensely tropical aroma. Taste is quite bitter with a lasting flavour of pineapples. Dry finish.
Hazy yellow color with white foam head. Aroma of fruity and spicy lemon. Taste of citrus fruit and a spicy undertone.
